1566248008_1KSUcqHRcq26pF5vJ2297jrNcAzkN.body:
> [uypchoz2t0chmax9](#comment_8_1FTDaUq9WYodtgWDMPkTUDTd1du3WAW1fW): The current 08chan version is bearable, millchan git from a few days ago (38ce267 to be exact) is horribly slow

You can see [here](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/12NPW6WLFBLVivNGqijcfktARobftfLFAN:dev:b79fce8b-df0d-4ab4-a89e-4c37585aa6d1:50#post-1e78af60-af33-4539-878f-ed6a525540e7) the performance measurements of loading a thread in the [version 30f239c](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/data/users/1H5YxVHvcfKM4STjJwyjYaBe8qbPyR6EZr/src/77a1b67304a838425342cdf412816323436d61f6.png) vs [version c90d9f35](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/data/users/1H5YxVHvcfKM4STjJwyjYaBe8qbPyR6EZr/src/e1d1175e882735dcbfcee857bcaa4b05923acafd.png) (current head).
This shows a performance improvement of ~6 times. Also, the main thread block is virtually non-existent in the updated version.
If you have results showing the opposite, that somehow the outdated version is faster, I'd be interested in seeing them.

> [uypchoz2t0chmax9](#comment_8_1FTDaUq9WYodtgWDMPkTUDTd1du3WAW1fW): browser becomes barely responsible for minutes when loading a thread with many images for the first time

That makes no sense. Images are being handled the same way in both versions.
